description.en: BEVO Token is a BEP-20 token created on the Binance Smart Chain. It's a cryptocurrency asset whose value is backed by real art from real artists. The BEVO NFT Art Gallery will feature paintings, sculptures, photos and digital artwork from artists all around the world. Each piece will be represented by a unique Non-Fungible Token minted on the Binance Smart Chain. This opens up the possibility for a truly frictionless way to trade not only NFTs but any work of art.
